pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-threaded ffmpeg codecs needed for the HTML5 <audio> and <video> tags. In addition to the patent-free ogg, vorbis and theora codecs, aac/ac3/mpeg4audio/h264/mov/mp3 are also included

maintainer.name: Alexander Golikov
maintainer.description: If you have any issues, please contact me via e-mail

use.flag: Split build into more shared libraries to speed up linking. Mostly intended for debugging and development, NOT RECOMMENDED for general use.
Enable proprietary codecs like H.264, MP3
